roleset.name: reshow a play or broadcast
roleset.note: RERUN-V NOTES: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. No verbnet class. No framenet mapping. Framed by Katie. (from rerun.01-v)

example.name: TV example
example.text: Comedy Central now says it will rerun the Tom Cruise episode.

example.name: Play example
example.text: Broadway says it will rerun the play early next year.

roleset.name: cause to perform again
roleset.note: RERUN-V NOTES: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. No verbnet class. No framenet mapping. Framed by Katie. (from rerun.02-v)

example.name: rerun performance
example.text: If we rerun the 2004 elections, its going to be like Groundhog's Day.

example.name: rerun operation
example.text: Clean up your hard disk and [PRO] rerun your disk optimizer.

roleset.name: run for office again
roleset.note: RERUN-V NOTES: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. No verbnet class. No framenet mapping. Framed by Katie. (from rerun.03-v)

example.name: rerun when not currently elected
example.text: If a presidential candidate loses the election, can they rerun in the next election?
